Name: Heart of Clear Springs
Desc: This exquisite and beautiful framed picture records the moment when Finch and Callirhoe were finally reunited. After endless waiting and longing, the Neighboring Nations Congenial Poetry Gala offered the opportunity for a perfect ending to their long-anticipated reunion. It's a moment of heartfelt joy that is worthy of being preserved for eternity.\nTime may go by, and all things may change, but promises and love are always awaiting in dreams...
